'''Echo''' is a member of the [[Millelith]]. He can be found near the Teleport Waypoint at [[Guili Plains]], [[Liyue]], stationed there alongside [[Xinghuo]].

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Echo & Xinghuo.png|Echo's location
NPC Location Xinghuo & Echo Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Echo once spoke with an extremely bad stutter. A wandering adventurer named [[Alice]] one day came across him, and gave him a potion to cure it. However, it had the unexpected side effect of compelling him to perfectly mimic those around him.
